preference.name: Email_polling_download_dir
preference.preference_description: Defines the existing directory where mail attachments are downloaded for the email polling functionality. Valid Values: Accepts single string as a value; each string must be the full operating system path of the directory.When a Windows path is used, a double slash is required after the drive designation, for example:Email_polling_download_dir=c:\\temp
